CMS Integrated: Strapi, Contentful, Sanity, Netlify CMS and MDX
FlexiBlog supports cloud-based or self-hosted CMSes for writing blog posts.

Instead of separately investing money and technical effort to purchase and get the 3rd party modules to work with your email marketing system, MumaraClassic has collected set of advanced modules integrated to seamlessly work with its structure. So stop worrying about adding more speed using Multithreading, fetching Geo Location of openers/clickers, or creating right PowerMTA configuration, MumaraClassic has everything for an ideal high volume email sending infrastructure.
Write a separate content unit to be able to dynamically send to specific subset of contacts in your list, upon meeting the criteria present in content unit.
SPIN THE CONTENT TO AVOID GETTING BLOCKED
An integrated content spinner too add as much content variations in your campaign as you want to experiment for better engagement and to avoid content filters.
Easily setup your system with PowerMTA SMTP server, fine-tune advanced directives and all configuration levels for high volume email sending.
Use your system resources in best possible way to supply campaigns more quickly and efficiently by opening up simultaneous connections in one unit of time.
High Volume Delivery and Sustainable Sender-Reputation

When you are high volume email marketer busy in making your database grow by targeting millions every day, you always need refined processes and set of features to keep the sender reputation intact and contact lists clean on the go. MumaraClassic has carefully collected all necessary features to give an extended protection against low sender-reputation, offers bunch of features to customize sending pattern, optimize sending speed and effortless performance of crucial tasks like keeping the list clean.

You would need not to separately invest time and budget to get your list scrubbed anymore; MumaraClassic brings powerful features to help you keeping the list squeaky clean. From list verification to bounce processing, hit the link to learn the features that MumaraClassic has collected in its arsenal to maintain list hygiene.

It requires speedy processes and multiplicity of options to handle high volume email delivery. Stop getting your system resource chocked for the next big campaign or while importing large email lists. MumaraClassic is perfect match for the email marketers with large lists to import and time critical management and delivery of emails.

Value added features for the high volume senders having large infrastructure of IPs & Sending Domains to keep the IP/Domain reputation automatically monitored across large number of web monitors and blocklists.
Easily integrate with AdStation the leading resource of email data monetization. Schedule, send, track and analyze Adstation campaigns to boost your affiliate revenue.
It gives you an ability to setup multiple MTAs or SMTP servers to manage sending from one centralized platform and explore more options to customize your sending pattern.
Use couple of options to mask primary domain to a sending domain of your choice, a way of adding multiple domains to send your campaigns from.

Ensure better response rate by applying list of filters to slice and dice your email marketing list. Avoid rejection and stop sending irrelevant and randomized email content to all the contacts. Segment your lists by applying appropriate filters to classify your contacts according to their sort, and better categorize the filtered subsets by using the export feature.

Feedback loop reports back the spam complaints to you as original sender. Our FBL processing feature helps you to flag and automatically process these complainants before you schedule your next campaign. So setup your system for the Feedback Loops of all major providers, conveniently process complaints before your deliverability suffer.
Stay away from the worries of getting manual backups, couple of options are available to get your database and file automatically backed up on set frequents.
Create as many user accounts as you want to manage your work while keeping the access level of account holders in your control through Users Groups.
Tools and Features for High Volume Email Sending

Powerful automation tools to help you reinforce the level of trust between you and your recipient. Setup series of follow-ups using Auto-Responders to attract prospects until you mark conversion. Celebrate important events with your recipients; automate seasonal promotions using Triggers to boost your sales graph during high-time events.

The best thing about email is scalability, and being high volume email sender you always need to have something that can offer detailed statistics and insights to measure your marketing ROI. MumaraClassic has ability to precisely track every single activity and go beyond ordinary email statistics, so that you can draw a close analysis to measure your marketing efforts.
Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.
